Charlotte Bennett is claiming the 63-year-old initiated unwelcome sexual advances when she was 25 while working as his executive assistant. Miss Bennett is not claiming there was any physical contact. For his part, Governor Cuomo says he never made any advances towards Miss Bennett. And smoke them if you've got them, Virginia becoming the latest state to legalize marijuana for adults. The state joins 15 others and the District of Columbia to allow recreational marijuana. Residents of Virginia will have to wait though as the new law does not take effect until 2024. I'm Ashley Strohmier, now back to THE GREG GUTFELD SHOW. For all of your headlines, log on to http://foxnews.com. You're watching the most powerful name in news, FOX News Channel.
